paper_abstract: We denote by M(R)(n) the test neighbourhood sufficient to extract the Euclidean Medial Axis of any n-dimensional discrete shape whose inner radius is no greater than R. In this paper, we study properties of discrete Euclidean disks overlappings so as to prove that in any given dimension n, M(R)(n) tends to the set of visible vectors as R tends to infinity.
paper_title: Visible Vectors and Discrete Euclidean Medial Axis
